title: Drawing, Design for Wallpaper or Textile with Meandering Floral Design, ca. 1900–30
title_raw: Design for Wallpaper or Textile with Meandering Floral Design
medium: gouache and graphite on heavy cream paper
inscribed: On verso of mount:  Plate #2062 8(8 encircled)
description: Pattern of large stylized flowers:  gold flower at lower left, pink flowers with leaves spotted with peacock feather "eyes" along right and center, blue flowers at upper right.  Vignette with marshy landscape in midground against pale blue background.  Guide lines indicated by graphite marks.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Design for Wallpaper or Textile with Meandering Floral Design, ca. 1900–30. gouache and graphite on heavy cream paper. Gift of Joseph E. Bostany. 1996-26-3.
